text: Noh Soo-Jin (, born on February 10, 1962) is a former South Korea football player. He was a part of the South Korea national football team who of the FIFA World Cup in 1986, 1990. Also He was a member of 1988 Summer Olympics and 1988 AFC Asian Cup. At the club side, he won the K-League 1989 with Yukong Elephants. He is currently manager of Yeongdeungpo Technical High School FC. == Club career statistics == {|border=1 align=center cellpadding=4 cellspacing=2 style="background: ivory; font-size: 95%; border: 1px
